mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DesignBoard (title, body, price, memberId,category) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{price}, #{memberId}, #{category})
mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.title, d.body, d.price, d.inserted, d.category, m.id memberId, d.clicked FROM DesignBoard d JOIN Member m ON d.memberId = m.id WHERE d.id = #{id}
